step_feedback.feedback: Good job clasping your hands. Try to keep your wrists a little straighter in the next repetitions.
You're raising your hands well. Focus on keeping your elbows closer together as you bring your hands toward your forehead.
Excellent job spreading your elbows wide behind your head. Keep your head upright and avoid pulling forward.
Holding steady! Ensure your wrists remain relatively straight and your elbows don't drift too far forward.
You're returning to the start position smoothly. Pay attention to keeping your wrists aligned as you lower your hands.

exercise_summary: You're doing great with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Focus on keeping your wrists straighter and your elbows closer as you move your hands. This helps you get the most out of the stretch.
